description: Round 2 Optimization - Full spectrum as originally specified
goal: Optimize entry/exit logic (z_entry, z_exit, lookback) + refine Round 1 winners

parameters.name: position_size_per_pair
parameters.description: Round 1 winner was 0.40 (at boundary). Test higher to 0.60.

parameters.name: max_holding_days
parameters.description: Round 1 winner was 30 (at boundary). Test up to 50.

parameters.name: stop_loss_z
parameters.description: Round 1 showed 4.0-7.0 all similar. Focus on tighter range.

parameters.name: z_entry_threshold
parameters.description: Entry Z-score. Lower=more trades, higher=fewer but higher quality.

parameters.name: z_exit_threshold
parameters.description: Exit Z-score. Lower=quicker exits, higher=wait for full mean reversion.

parameters.name: lookback_period
parameters.description: Z-score calculation window. Shorter=more responsive, longer=more stable.
